abs550aer.comment: Optical thickness of atmospheric aerosols at wavelength 550 nanometers.
abs550aer.long_name: Ambient Aerosol Absorption Optical Thickness at 550nm

ccn.long_name: Cloud Condensation Nuclei Concentration at Liquid Cloud Top

chepasoa.long_name: Total Net Production of Anthropogenic Secondary Organic Aerosol

chepsoa.comment: If model lumps secondary organic aerosol (SOA) emissions with primary organic aerosol (POA), then the sum of POA and SOA emissions is reported as OA emissions. Here, mass refers to the mass of primary organic matter, not mass of organic carbon alone.
chepsoa.long_name: Chemical Production of Dry Aerosol Secondary Organic Matter

cltc.comment: Convective cloud area fraction (reported as a percentage) for the whole atmospheric column, as seen from the surface or the top of the atmosphere. Includes only convective cloud.

cod.comment: The optical thickness is the integral along the path of radiation of a volume scattering/absorption/attenuation coefficient. The radiative flux is reduced by a factor exp(-optical_thickness) on traversing the path. A coordinate variable of radiation_wavelength or radiation_frequency can be specified to indicate that the optical thickness applies at specific wavelengths or frequencies. The atmosphere optical thickness applies to radiation passing through the entire atmosphere. 'Cloud' means the component of extinction owing to the presence of liquid or ice water particles. The specification of a physical process by the phrase due_to_process means that the quantity named is a  single term in a sum of terms which together compose the general quantity named by omitting the phrase.

depdust.comment: Fdry mass deposition rate of dust

drybc.comment: Dry deposition includes gravitational settling and turbulent deposition.
drybc.long_name: Dry Deposition Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass

drydust.comment: Dry deposition includes gravitational settling and turbulent deposition.

drynh3.comment: Dry Deposition includes gravitational settling and turbulent deposition

drynh4.comment: Dry Deposition includes gravitational settling and turbulent deposition

drynoy.comment: NOy is the sum of all simulated oxidized nitrogen species out of NO, NO2, HNO3, HNO4, NO3 aerosol, NO3(radical), N2O5, PAN, other organic nitrates. Dry deposition includes gravitational settling and turbulent deposition.

dryo3.comment: Dry Deposition includes gravitational settling and turbulent deposition.

dryoa.comment: Tendency of atmosphere mass content of organic dry aerosol due to dry deposition: This is the sum of dry deposition of primary organic aerosol (POA) and dry deposition of secondary organic aerosol (SOA). Here, mass refers to the mass of organic matter, not mass of organic carbon alone.  We recommend a scale factor of POM=1.4*OC, unless your model has more detailed info available. Was called dry_pom in old ACCMIP Excel table. Dry deposition includes gravitational settling and turbulent deposition.
dryoa.long_name: Dry Deposition Rate of Dry Aerosol Total Organic Matter

dryso2.comment: Dry Deposition includes gravitational settling and turbulent deposition

dryso4.comment: Dry Deposition includes gravitational settling and turbulent deposition

dryss.comment: Dry deposition includes gravitational settling and turbulent deposition.
dryss.long_name: Dry Deposition Rate of Sea-Salt Aerosol

emiaco.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic CO

emianox.comment: Store flux as Nitrogen. Anthropogenic fraction. NOx=NO+NO2, Includes agricultural waste burning but no other biomass burning. Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.
emianox.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic NOx

emiaoa.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Anthropogenic Organic Aerosol

emibc.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.
emibc.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass

emibvoc.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field._If_ fixed molecular weight of NMVOC is not available in model, please provide in units of kilomole m-2 s-1 (i.e. kg m-2 s-1 as if model NMVOC had molecular weight of 1) and add a comment to your file.
emibvoc.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Biogenic NMVOC

emico.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emidms.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emidust.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emiisop.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field

eminh3.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

eminox.comment: NOx=NO+NO2. Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emioa.comment: This is the sum of total emission of primary organic aerosol (POA) and total production of secondary organic aerosol (SOA) (emipoa+chepsoa). Here, mass refers to the mass of organic matter, not mass of organic carbon alone. We recommend a scale factor of POM=1.4*OC, unless your model has more detailed info available.  Integrate 3D chemical production and emission field vertically to 2d field.
emioa.long_name: Primary Emission and Chemical Production of Dry Aerosol Organic Matter

emiso2.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.

emiso4.comment: Direct primary emission does not include secondary sulfate production. Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.
emiso4.long_name: Total Direct Emission Rate of SO4

emiss.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field.
emiss.long_name: Total Emission Rate of Sea-Salt Aerosol

emivoc.comment: Integrate 3D emission field vertically to 2d field. _If_ fixed molecular weight of NMVOC is not available in model, please provide in units of kilomole m-2 s-1 (i.e. kg m-2 s-1 as if model NMVOC had molecular weight of 1) and add a comment to your file.

lwp.comment: The total mass of liquid water in cloud per unit area.

mmrno3.comment: Dry mass fraction of nitrate aerosol particles in air.

od440aer.comment: AOD from the ambient aerosols (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute 'wavelength: 440nm'

od550aer.comment: AOD from the ambient aerosols (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute 'wavelength: 550nm'

od550bb.comment: total organic aerosol AOD due to biomass burning (excluding so4, nitrate BB components)
od550bb.long_name: Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm Due to Biomass Burning

od550bc.comment: Total aerosol AOD due to black carbon aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

od550csaer.comment: AOD from the ambient aerosols in clear skies if od550aer is for all-sky (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute 'wavelength: 550nm'

od550dust.comment: Total aerosol AOD due to dust aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

od550lt1aer.comment: od550 due to particles with wet diameter less than 1 um  (ambient here means wetted). When models do not include explicit size information, it can be assumed that all anthropogenic aerosols and natural secondary aerosols have diameter less than 1 um.
od550lt1aer.long_name: Ambient Fine Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm

od550no3.comment: Total aerosol AOD due to nitrate aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

od550oa.comment: Total aerosol AOD due to organic aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.
od550oa.long_name: Total Organic Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm

od550so4.comment: Total aerosol AOD due to sulfate aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

od550soa.comment: Total organic aerosol AOD due to secondary aerosol  at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.
od550soa.long_name: Particulate Organic Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm

od550ss.comment: Total aerosol AOD due to sea salt aerosol at a wavelength of 550 nanometres.

od870aer.comment: AOD from the ambient aerosols (i.e., includes aerosol water).  Does not include AOD from stratospheric aerosols if these are prescribed but includes other possible background aerosol types. Needs a comment attribute 'wavelength: 870nm'

pod0.comment: Accumulated stomatal ozone flux over the threshold of 0 mol m-2 s-1; Computation: Time Integral of (hourly above canopy ozone concentration * stomatal conductance * Rc/(Rb+Rc) )

ptp.comment: 2D monthly mean thermal tropopause calculated using WMO tropopause definition on 3d temperature

reffclwtop.comment: Droplets are liquid only.  This is the effective radius as seen from space over liquid cloudy portion of grid cell. This is the value from uppermost model layer with liquid cloud or, if available, or for some models it is the sum over all liquid cloud tops, no matter where they occur, as long as they are seen from the top of the atmosphere (TOA) each time sample when computing monthly mean. Reported values are weighted by total liquid cloud top fraction of  (as seen from TOA) each time sample when computing monthly mean.

rlutaf.comment: Flux corresponding to rlut resulting from aerosol-free call to radiation, following Ghan (ACP, 2013)

rlutcsaf.comment: Flux corresponding to rlutcs resulting from aerosol-free call to radiation, following Ghan (ACP, 2013)
rlutcsaf.long_name: TOA Outgoing Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Longwave Radiation

rsutaf.comment: Flux corresponding to rsut resulting from aerosol-free call to radiation, following Ghan (ACP, 2013)

rsutcsaf.comment: Flux corresponding to rsutcs resulting from aerosol-free call to radiation, following Ghan (ACP, 2013)
rsutcsaf.long_name: TOA Outgoing Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Shortwave Radiation

sedustCI.comment: Dry mass deposition rate of dust aerosol.
sedustCI.long_name: Sedimentation Flux of Dust Mode Coarse Insoluble

tatp.comment: 2D monthly mean thermal tropopause calculated using WMO tropopause definition on 3d temperature

tntrl27.comment: Tendency of air temperature due to longwave radiative heating
tntrl27.long_name: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Longwave Radiative Heating

tntrs27.comment: Tendency of air temperature due to shortwave radiative heating
tntrs27.long_name: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Shortwave Radiative Heating

toz.comment: Total ozone column calculated at 0 degrees C and 1 bar, such that 1m = 1e5 DU.

tropoz.comment: Tropospheric ozone column, should be consistent with definition of tropopause used to calculate the pressure of the tropopause (ptp). Calculated at 0 degrees C and 1 bar, such that 1m = 1e5 DU.

ttop.comment: cloud_top refers to the top of the highest cloud. Air temperature is the bulk temperature of the air, not the surface (skin) temperature.

wetbc.comment: Surface deposition rate of black carbon (dry mass) due to wet processes
wetbc.long_name: Wet Deposition Rate of Black Carbon Aerosol Mass

wetdust.comment: Surface deposition rate of dust (dry mass) due to wet processes

wetnh3.comment: Surface deposition rate of ammonia (NH3) due to wet processes

wetnh4.comment: Surface deposition rate of ammonium (NH4) due to wet processes

wetnoy.comment: NOy is the sum of all simulated oxidized nitrogen species, out of NO, NO2, HNO3, HNO4, NO3 aerosol, NO3 (radical), N2O5, PAN, other organic nitrates.
wetnoy.long_name: Wet Deposition Rate of NOy Including Aerosol Nitrate

wetoa.comment: Deposition rate of organic matter in aerosols (measured by the dry mass) due to wet processes
wetoa.long_name: Wet Deposition Rate of Dry Aerosol Total Organic Matter

wetso2.comment: Deposition rate of sulfur dioxide due to wet processes

wetso4.comment: Deposition rate of sulfate aerosols (measured by the dry mass) due to wet processes

wetss.comment: Deposition rate of sea salt aerosols (measured by the dry mass) due to wet processes
wetss.long_name: Wet Deposition Rate of Sea-Salt Aerosol

ztp.comment: 2D monthly mean thermal tropopause calculated using WMO tropopause definition on 3d temperature
